entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to light snow late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
